SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AM
Asset Manager used for managing all assets in game: - texture images - sounds - music - fonts - levels
Block
A block is a static body that can be placed on the map.
BlockType
Enum for block types.
Config
Config class containing all user settings.
CustomButtonUI
Custom button UI used to change the color of the button when it is pressed.
CustomLayeredPane
Custom JLayeredPane that allows for a background color to be set.
DatabaseHandler
Handles the database connection and high scores.
DynamicBody
Custom dynamic body class that extends DynamicBody.
Enemy
The enemy tank class.
GameState
The GameState enum is used to keep track of the current state of the game.
LevelCreator
The level creator class.
Listener
The listener class for all input devices and events.
LoadLevel
This class is used to load a level from a file.
MainGame
 
Pickup
Pickup class for pickup perks.
PickupType
Enum for the different types of pickups.
Player
The player class.
SaveLevel
This class is used to save a level to a file.
Shot
A shot fired by a tank.
ShotStyle
Enum for the different shooting styles.
ShotType
Enum for the different types of shots.
SoundHandler
A class that handles all sound effects and background music.
Spawn
A Spawn is a DynamicBody with a GhostlyFixture that spawns a Tank of the specified TankType at the specified position.
StaticBody
Custom static body class that extends static body.
Tank
The base class for all tanks.
TankType
An enum containing all the different types of tanks.
WindowBuild
This class is used to create the build overlay and handle the file chooser.
WindowCommons
A class containing common methods and variables used by the windows.
WindowDeath
 
WindowHandler
This class handles the window and the user view.
WindowHighScore
 
WindowMenu
This class is responsible for creating the menu and handling the menu buttons.
WindowPlay
